  • Method Details

    • createUrbanBlockShp

      public static java.io.File createUrbanBlockShp​(java.io.File parcelFile, java.io.File outFolder) throws java.io.IOException
      Generate urban block shapefile out of a parcel plan. Urban block can be viewed as a block but must have a discontinuity (i.e. road or public space) between them.
      Parameters:
      parcelFile - input parcel
      outFolder - folder where goes the generated urban block
      Returns:
      a collection of urban block
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - reading geo file

    • createUrbanBlock

      Generate urban block shapefile out of a parcel plan. Urban block can be viewed as a block but must have a discontinuity (i.e. road or public space) between them.
      Parameters:

      outFolder - folder where goes the generated urban block

    • createUrbanBlock

      public static org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection createUrbanBlock​(java.util.List<org.opengis.feature.simple.SimpleFeature> parcel)
      Generate urban block out of a parcel plan. Urban block can be viewed as a block but must have a discontinuity (i.e. road or public space) between them.
      Parameters:
      parcel - input parcel
      Returns:
      a SimpleFeatureCollection of urban block

    • createUrbanBlock

      public static org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection createUrbanBlock​(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection parcel)
      Generate urban block out of a parcel plan. Urban block can be viewed as a block but must have a discontinuity (i.e. road or public space) between them. Generate a 1.1m buffer and then a -1.1m buffer (this length allow to fill gaps superior to 2.2m, corresponding to the minimal width of a road). It may alter geometries but it fills holes.
      Parameters:
      parcel - input parcel
      Returns:
      a SimpleFeatureCollection of urban block

    • createUrbanBlock

      public static org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection createUrbanBlock​(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection parcel, boolean doBuffer)
      Generate urban block out of a parcel plan. Urban block can be viewed as a block but must have a discontinuity (i.e. road or public space) between them.
      Parameters:
      parcel - input parcel
      doBuffer - do we generate a 1.1m buffer and then a -1.1m buffer (this length allow to fill gaps superior to 2.2m, corresponding to the minimal width of a road). It may alter geometries but it fills holes.
      Returns:
      a SimpleFeatureCollection of urban block

    • createUrbanBlock

      public static org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection createUrbanBlock​(org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry bigGeom)

    • createBufferBorder

      public static org.locationtech.jts.geom.Geometry createBufferBorder​(org.geotools.data.simple.SimpleFeatureCollection in)
      Get the border of a studied zone. Buffers have fixed values and could be parametrized.
      Parameters:
      in - input SimpleFeatureCollection
      Returns:
      the border without the inside geometry
